sections.heading: Investigation of alleged acts of delinquency, dependency and incorrigibility8-304
sections.text: Investigation of alleged acts of delinquency, dependency and incorrigibilityA. The law enforcement officer having jurisdiction in the place in which an act of delinquency or incorrigibility is alleged to have occurred
